sentences.en: As we drew near, I saw that the boot lid was up.
sentences.cn: 我们靠近时,我看见汽车行李箱的盖子翘了起来.

sentences.en: Cooking with the lid on gives the food that distinctive smoky flavour.
sentences.cn: 盖上盖子做会让这种食物有一种熏制般的独特风味。

sentences.en: Cover the casserole with a tight-fitting lid.
sentences.cn: 用大小合适的盖子盖住砂锅。

sentences.en: He lifted the lid of the box and looked inside.
He snapped the lid on to keep the contents dry.
sentences.cn: 他把盖子扣紧,以使内容物保持干燥.

sentences.en: I can't get the lid off this jar.
sentences.cn: 我打不开这广口瓶的盖子。

sentences.en: I can't get this lid off — It'seems to be nailed down.
sentences.cn: 我打不开这个盖子,好像是被钉住了.

sentences.en: I can't unscrew the lid of this jar.
it's time to put the lid on all the talk.
sentences.cn: 到了该结束所有这些谈话的时候了。

sentences.en: Remove the lid and boil away all the liquid.
sentences.cn: 拿掉盖子并把所有液体都烧干。

sentences.en: Screw down the lid fairly tightly.
She lifted the lid of the box and displayed the contents.
sentences.cn: 她把盒盖掀起，展示了里边的东西。

sentences.en: she was no longer able to keep the lid on her simmering anger.
sentences.cn: 她再也无法克制住满腔的怒气了。

sentences.en: Tap the lid down carefully so as not to break the contents.
sentences.cn: 要把盖子轻轻地敲下去,免得把里面的东西打碎.

sentences.en: The lid of the box had been inlaid with silver.
The lid won't come off accidentally , it's been fastened on.
sentences.cn: 盖子不会掉下来, 装得很牢.

sentences.en: The lid, turned upside down, served as a coffee table.
sentences.cn: 那个盖子被翻过来当作咖啡桌。

sentences.en: We managed to prise off the lid with a tyre lever.
sentences.cn: 我们设法用卸外胎用的撬棍撬开了盖子.

words.tran_cn: 有盖子的；覆盖着的；有…眼睑的
无盖的；注视的；无眼睑的
给…盖上盖子（lid的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 把盖子盖上；禁止；取缔；使达到忍无可忍的地步

phrases.phrase: take (或lift) the lid off (或lift the lid on)

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]揭开盖子，揭露(丑事或丑闻)；揭露…的真相
事情完蛋了；没什么可说的了；事情已经到顶了
(丑恶、恐怖)暴露于众，丑恶之事暴露无遗，原形毕露，真相大白

trans.tran_en: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container
